task.summary: The time has come for great changes!
The time has come for great changes(2)
Added new articles logic, added new design, edited a few redux logic
Refactored some apiActions, added some styles, changes modals appearing logic.
Added some apiActions, added some responsive styles.
Removed useless code, refactored some components and added some styles.
Added possibility added photo, and refactored some action.
Refactored media requests and set some responsible design, refactored get news action and added more news sources.
Added some design changes and added filters for modals, implemented preview possibility before public new article.
Refactoring some logic and implemented a bit responsive design.
Implemented socket comments and other features and design.
Refactoring project, changed some components and styles.
